website_summaries.verdict: This soothing night light and sound machine combo is designed to help encourage natural sleep cycles for your young ones.
pros: An app-controlled sound machine that's made for children of a range of ages
Easy to control using the app or built-in controls, though a toddler lock feature can prevent kids from turning the machine off
The soft light has several brightness and color settings, and there are a variety of sounds to choose from
cons: The plug is finicky and causes the device to lose power frequently
The app collects data like GPS location and sleep habits

customer_reviews.title: Turns on by itself
customer_reviews.text: Turns on in middle of night without prompting. I contacted the company and they said they could tell that there had been some touch activity. This was impossible. I tried setting some programs like they recommended this did not stop the problem. I would not buy this again and I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves the sounds and light of this night light. perfect for my 4 month old. UPDATED - 8/22/2018 I HATE THIS THING!! Music machine plays for 20 - 30 secs, stops and then repeats the 20 - 30 sec, stop and repeats. Pretty sure my daughter hates it as well. Terrible. Didn't even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A.

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: the sound stopped working after about 9 nights of using it. Lights work but not sound. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kg

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days then just stopped
customer_reviews.text: We tried using this for our near 4-month old. We love the concept. Until we learned the controls are on the bottom, unlit. Which means finding the phone at 3 am to adjust the settings, or fiddling in the dark on the device. 2nd red flag..not nearly as loud as needed for baby white noise, and the sound quality is subpar. Finally, we have a fussy tired baby and we're trying to adjust the sound machine, and it's not adjusting, neither from our phone or from the manual controls. It's stuck. And meanwhile still baby crying. Unplugged, replugged and tried to restart the device. Doesn't turn on. Baby still crying. Done. Return.
customer_reviews.author: tyinSD

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this already! It is absolutely beautiful in our modern nursery. I love that when the time comes for the OK to Wake clock, we won't have an ugly ansimal shaped alarm clock. I wish we could add music from our phones to play through, but there are plenty of sound options. The color choices are endless, but I do wish it could be slightly less bright than the lowest setting. Overall in love and recommending it to everyone we know.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if the cord didn't fall out constantly
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of the Hatch Baby Rests. One is great. One is not. This is due to the cord that connects the device to the wall. It seems sometimes they send one that securely fits with no issues and other times they send one that CONSTANTLY falls out. Like every time you touch it. It really ruins the ability to use it if every time you touch it it turns off and the the cord falls out. If you are lucky enough to get the model with the improved design, you'll enjoy it. If you aren't...return it.
customer_reviews.author: Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe this was made by people who have kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is plagued with basic design issues. When your child begins screaming for a particular song, good luck fumbling with the cludgy app as there is no way to control the device without your smart phone. The Android app is clearly made by Apple first developers and it's both confusing and limiting - for instance there is no way to delete any preprogrammed programs. It's surprising how bad the preset sounds are too, and the lack of flexibility to add your own. I am out of the 60 day return window so will probably throw this out.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this unreliable sound machine
customer_reviews.text: We’ve have/had three other sound machines and this has definitely been the most expensive and most disappointing. After putting up with it for almost two years, dealing with it not working when tapped, not responding to the app, and not remembering the sound/light programs, and just being a general PIA, I am on here to find a cheaper, more dependable option. Save your money for something else. After four kids, I can tell you that the sound is all the same to them. There is nothing special about this machine other than it is trying to be fancy and is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Comomedy

customer_reviews.title: The ability to change colors from outside the room is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This device has been AMAZING for our family. Our toddler (2.5) understands the color differences and after one or two nights of training stays in his bed. The waves noise are also great at helping him fall asleep at night. I was hesitant because it’s kind of expensive for a light and sound maker, but the app makes it so with the cost. We sometimes get him up early from a nap or in the mornings and this doesn’t have us breaking the rules related to colors. Also the toddler lock helped ingrain the fact that this wasn’t a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Kimmitt

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever! My daughter loves it and we do too!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved our nights! This sound machine with all its features has helped us get our daughter fall asleep alone and dont wake up in the middle of the night. The sound relaxes her enough to fall asleep by herself and soothes her avoiding feeling anxious when she's alone in her room at night. The brightness can be controlled as the volume of the sound. Being able to program it also has helped so much! I recommend it fully. And would buy it again in a heartbeat if i needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Gonsal2008

customer_reviews.title: Good product but lacks app purchase details
customer_reviews.text: The noise machine is great, but lacking full detail in the purchase. I did not know i would need to pay a monthly, or yearly, subscription for the app that you need to do all of the functions for this machine. It would have been nice to know before I was surprised by the price app price. It could be easily added into the description of the Hatch when talking about the app. Not sure if I’ll even get the app since the reviews aren’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - when it works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- when it works. Unfortunately I have had 3 in the last 18 months and none of them work how they should. We had to tinker with the chord each time we wanted it to turn on. It would turn off randomly or make static noise in the middle of the night, and wake up our kid. Customer service was helpful the first few times, and replaced our product free of charge (super professional). Now we are out of warranty and they won’t do anything with the third that doesn’t work. I wanted to believe each time that I just got a lemon, but three with the same issues?
customer_reviews.author: Gieve H Ameli

customer_reviews.title: Horrible flaw
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, I’ve never been so disappointed with the awful design flaw. Without the app, the device continues to fail to function correctly. When you press on the dimming button to dim the light, it turns off. When you hit the top of the device it turns on and auto plays the melody. Can’t get the colors to change without the app unless you completely hit the next button or some other mechanism way. Just extremely frustrating product, wish I could give it zero stars due to not being able to brighten or dim the device with the appropriate buttons
customer_reviews.author: Zulu_Man

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: If you're debating on spending the extra money bc you're looking for something cheaper; stop! This is honestly the best thing that happened to my daughters sleep. The first week we had the Hatch, I thought she was in a trance bc of how well she slept. I love the many many different options for the night light and music from brightness and sound level to customizing the color. It has helped us set a difference between nap and bed time because of the color and sound we play. I love the wake up call part BC my 13 month old would sleep all day if I let her. This is my best purchase for her room.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W.

customer_reviews.title: This Ain’t It
customer_reviews.text: Too dim a nightlight to see my baby’s face to feed it. Too poor a volume range to actually hear the most basic white noise from 5 ft away. You know how they say the noise is comforting to little ones because the placenta was like a vacuum cleaner next to their face? This is loud to baby more on the audio level of a rat fart. A white noise whisperer. Maybe mine is busted and the inability to sufficiently increase the sound a fluke. If so, don’t throw your money away on this. Got me back to using my phone for sound as I look resentfully at this randomly colored not-bright-enough light. Smh. Amazon reviews ain’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BedTime Essential
customer_reviews.text: We brought this white Noise Machine on guidance of a family member who infant had trouble falling asleep at night in their own bassinet like my son. It seemed to work immediately "not it alone" but it was the missing piece to our bedtime routine. The controls are straight forward easy to use as well as the app. The only downside to this device I've noticed in comparison too other devices is the lack of different sounds. However, where the competition lacked in functionality and ease of use this device thrived in. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: KP42

customer_reviews.title: Such a failure - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time a write a review but I couldnt let anyone else fall into this trap! I really wanted to love this for my 4 months old baby! It worked fine for the first week and then suddenly the white noise sound would trun off and come back on a min later so loud waking my baby up in the middle of the night! Other nights it would work fine but the sound would suddenly fade as if the speaker is damaged. Finally now the sound completely doesn’t work and only the light does. What a waste of money. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Signal doesn’t reach far enough for us.
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. My only complaint is that the signal doesn’t reach to our bedroom. Our sons room is upstairs and this means if I want to adjust anything on it I have to walk across the house. Most of the adjustments I want to do early in the morning or late at night so we can sleep in if he’s still sleeping but getting out of bed defeats that purpose. We may end up going w something else bc of that. It seems like such a small thing but it’s a pain. Other than that the colors and sounds are great, user friendly, and I like that the colors can be dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: rachel grayson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought the one that's a tad more expensive for those additional features, but I love this product. It's so easy to use with it's touch feature and also to control it with your iphone. I love the different colors (how you can dim or increase the brightness) and the different white noises you can use. I pretty much strictly use the waves and can make them softer or louder. It's a great addition to the baby's room, and I really want to get one for my older son, and probably for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and so do my Littles! My daughter (4) is finally sleeping through the night. My son (6) feels safe in bed enough now that he doesn't need the closet light in any more - YAY!! Though we've been using them for almost two months, I haven't taken time to set them up on my phone because the device is so easy to use manually, but it's something I intend to try out and a great feature to have available. My Littles love the sound options and colors, especially the rainbow transition. They are excited to turn it on see night and bedtime has become a breeze. I love, love, LOVE this product and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: GHEUER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product (crappy app)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is dope. I set the light to look like a glowing womb and it’s turned up on ocean to sound like my luscious belly. She sleeps so well now! If Thor comes knocking from the heavens above or the lawn man comes knocking from his van down by the river, I can simply turn up the volume with my phone. I took away one star because said phone app suuuuuuucks. It’s too slow, which is detrimental for many reasons. It’s poorly “organized”. There’s no way to label the settings you create. I haven’t tried the timer because my baby is basically a potato and timers are obsolete to root vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Aperkot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 11 month old and wish I bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Functions perfectly and will grow with my little one. I love the time to rise function. My daughter sleeps very well with white noise and this works perfectly for that. The light is perfect for middle of the night feedings or diaper changes. I wish i had gotten this sooner! When she is a little older i plan to teach her about the time to wake (ex- when the light is green its time to get up). I love the schedule function as well. It turns on and off daily in correlation with her naps and bedtime. There is even a toddler lock option that works great!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Superior product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! No wonder it’s highly rated by 5,000 people lol! Worth every penny if your not in love with a cheaper one. There is a large range for volume control and light brightness! This is our first night using it and already the bedroom door is closed so he hears us less in other parts of the house! Our son just turned 5. Sounds exaggerated after only having this for one night but for a mom who has struggled with a child being able to settle down in the dark with outside highway noises etc, this has made an incredibly positive impact on me and my child.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F

customer_reviews.title: Top 10 items for new babies
customer_reviews.text: Have one for my first baby and was looking for a cheaper alternative but didn’t find one with the same Bluetooth/schedule feature. I also considered the hatch rest+ but read that the Wifi connection can be finicky (cost more and while I have Alexa/Google, never really felt a need to connect them). So I ponied up and paid for this one. Absolutely makes my top 10 new baby/parents list of must haves.
customer_reviews.author: highly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: After going through hundreds of dollars in less expensive sound machines (that weren’t even lights) that all stopped working I finally splurged on this and it has been so worth the extra money. Now we have one for our toddler and one for our baby. I love the volume capability, remote access with phone, and that the light can be super dim. I keep our baby’s under her bassinet on white noise and at the lowest setting of red so I can see her during the night. The only thing I don’t like about it is that there’s no battery backup for when the power goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best light/sleep machine/ excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using the Hatch rest since she was a baby. This device has different sounds that allow babies, children and even adults to relax and fall asleep fast. I love it because I can program it and set the times for nap, night time, and wake up time with the Hatch app from my phone. Also, the Hatch rest can be used as a night light. The night light has a setting to change its colors. My daughter loves to wake up to the sound of the birds and the colorful light. Finally, Hatch customer service is outstanding. They take the time to listen to your concerns or problems and give you a prompt solution.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSSS!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not fool proof as in kid 1 will still wake up and go to bed whenever but it sets up boundaries a little bit. And it’s great for when the power goes out because it turns right back on unlike our other sound machine. One complaint that I’ve seen before but it’s SO minor is the whole Bluetooth aspect, as in you have to be within a certain range to adjust the sound machine and two people can’t be in the app at the same time. Again, minor flaw but we don’t even notice it, it’s definitely not a regular issue at all
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Could be perfect with a few software enhancements
customer_reviews.text: For the pre-programmed activities (i.e. bedtime), there should be a way to schedule the light and sound functions independently. I would like to be able to have the sound play all night, but have the light turn off after an hour. 2nd feature request: my other sound machine has the ability to increase the volume of the selected sound if it detects ambient noise. Since the Rest+ has a microphone, it would be great if the sound would automatically increase if it detected noise. Other than that, I love this product. I have submitted my feature requests to Hatch Baby directly, so I will update my review depending on the response.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product enough!! My toddler started getting frustrated every morning before his set time to wake up and would cry. He would also resist nap time and bedtime (what toddler doesn’t?). But since we got the hatch, he gets excited to run to bed and watch it turn from his “wake” color to his “sleep” color. He has also stopped crying in the mornings before it’s time to get up! He gets so excited when it turns on that he’s started running out of bed to tell us his nightlight turned green! Best product ever.
customer_reviews.author: User222

customer_reviews.title: My lifesaver for nap time routine
customer_reviews.text: For anyone expecting or with a newborn, this white noise machine is my lifesaver. Seriously, I use it everyday and it calms my Xavier instantly. I think he knows it's nap time as soon as he hears it so our schedule has been pretty darn good and his fussy moments are minimal. You can either use the app or tap the top of the machine to change sounds and lights. At first I tried to just use YouTube but it cancels the sound as soon as I switch to another app and I'm usually getting other stuff done while he naps so I don't like to leave my phone in the room. This helps a ton 😌👶🏻💙
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool idea and love the app connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few uses. Very cool idea and love the app connectivity, but poorly made (at least mine was).
customer_reviews.author: jen boyles

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked relatively well for us. We have a 3 year old who used to sleep in until his 1 year old twin brothers decided to get up at the crack of dawn. It threw off his sense of time. He was excited about his new lamp and likes to brag when he sees it turn green. He's probably about 60/40 with obeying it but we will take it. The noises and colors are great, and it can get LOUD which is great. It can be super bright too. We keep the brightness at like 15% for a nightlight bc it can be so bright.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Quattrone

customer_reviews.title: Great wake up light
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with our 4 year old to keep him in his bed until a normal wake up time. He really loves it and is really proud when he wakes up and sees the green light on. I love how you can set programmed times/lights/sounds but you can also adjust it from your phone if you need to (light brightness/sound volume etc). I bought a second one for our other child but she really doesn’t get the concept yet but I am hoping to train her on it earlier to keep her in bed also. We love it and it has helped most days to keep our son in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: While I wanted to love this it has turned into a very expensive night light the sounds began to annoy my little one so we stopped using them and while the app is great figuring it all out took time and I am pretty tech savvy I still have programming issues with it and have been woken by screams when it decides to just turn off and my little freaks out ugh I had high hopes we are gonna keep it because of the hassle of returning but it’s just a very expensive night light
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Really great with one exception..
customer_reviews.text: Just spent an hour going through various light settings, sounds and establishing several nighttime programs. It’s a fantastic product. I setup a sound for 10 minutes at a higher volume, next 10 minutes little lower, next 10 minutes little lower etc. You can do the same thing with light. As LO is falling asleep, having volume slowly decrease thru the programs is awesome and exactly what I was looking for. The only issue I have is the sound selection for lullabies. There are only three options and they are all high pitched. For anyone with sensory overloaded toddlers, this is not the ideal music for falling asleep. Wish there were a couple low pitched lullabies better for falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: ChanH

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has several sound and color options, you can mix and match and set specific. Has volume and brightness control and can be controlled by pur phone. I took off a star because if you use it manually, the buttons are on the bottom and you can't see them in the dark. Also seems to default to the loudest setting when changing sounds, which isn't a good combo when there is a sleeping baby. I wanted to love this more. Hoping to use it more as baby gets older.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE ITEM FOR BABY
customer_reviews.text: I accidently called 911 somehow by pressing the lock button on my phone. After that someone told me I had to try this. I bought it and literally have used this EVERY SINGLE DAY! I absolutely love this! I appreciate the app settings so my kiddo can use it for different stages and ages of growth, there are timers for morning, nap, and night, different light settings and different white noise sounds. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the money. There’s different sounds you can choose from as well as the different colors. You can adjust the loudness and brightness of the device from the device or from the app on your phone which I love. I don’t always have to go in to adjust the device I can just do it off my phone. I also use it as just a nightlight and not have any sound on. But I believe this product is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Machine For Baby/Toddler on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the BEST thing i've purchased for a baby. My son was nearly one not sleeping more than 4-5 hour stretches and with the purchase of this he is now sleeping 10-12 hour stretches during the night. The sound is perfect to block out noise for babies who are lighter sleepers and their are many different options, the different colors give the baby a sense of change so they differentiate between naps and bedtime.. unlike other sound machines i looked into before ordering the HATCH. Seriously a MUST BUY!! love love love, only downfall is the bluetooth connection for remote control from my phone has to be super close in reach to work, other than that, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! I have one for each of my kids. Started them with it around 2 years old. They use it as a nightlight and I have it set to turn a different color at 7am. They both know they are to stay quiet in the bed until it turns. They love it!! And I love that it can be controlled remotely from my phone. I had one similar to this without that function and couldn’t stand it. There are times I wanted to turn it early or delay it and now I can!! I always recommend this to my mama friends!!
customer_reviews.author: BD1128

customer_reviews.title: Great noise machine for any baby/child
customer_reviews.text: Love this product 🥰 so easy to use and I like that I’m able to control it on my phone and still use my phone even after leaving the app. This product is simple enough for my 2 year old to use. She picks her favorite sound which is the ocean 🌊 and turns the nightlight to pink without my help at all. The only thing that I don’t like is when I push the top of the device to change the color, it also changes the sound. So I either have to push the buttons on the bottom or use my phone but it’s not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good features but difficult to mess with
customer_reviews.text: I like the lighting feature. However, I hate having to connect to my phone via bluetooth everytime I need to change a setting. It takes too much time. Plus if you aren't within 25 feet of the hatch it won't connect to your phone and allow you to change the setting. I've bought 2 hatches (one for each of my kids) and they are nice looking and it has great features, I just wish it wasn't so difficult to change the settings on them.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Especially love controlling it from my phone
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this. I was sure the light system would help my toddlers establish a good sleep routine and it really has delivered. I’m happy with being able to control it on my phone because some mornings I want to lie in bed just a little longer. I have the light turn red when it’s time to sleep, yellow for twenty minutes in the morning to mean ‘almost time to wake’, then green when they can get up. Once I got all these programmed into the app, it’s super easy just to keep our routine going without thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Probably buying one for our room too
customer_reviews.text: Best sound machine/night light we’ve ever had. Will be ordering a second for our 2 year old. Everything is customizable from my phone. Sound, loudness, light color, brightness, length of time, when it turns on/off, ok to wake color/sound options. I have the ability to set multiple programs...one that starts it when I want at the light color, brightness, sound and level, and length of time until it’s ok to wake. Plus have a toddler tamper lock on it. It’s sleek, small enough and blows our last nightlight/sound machine/ok to wake machines yes machines away. Went from 3 to 1. Wish I had this while nursing my 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Rest for our 3 year old’s room. She was great about sleeping in until 8am or so until recently she started waking up between 6am & 7am... that isn’t going to fly! After setting a wake up time and instructing her to wait until the light is green and a few days of trial and error it’s all good. The device works great and as intended. We’ve now bought a second one for our newborns room. When she’s old enough to sleep in there we’ll use it as background noise too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sound machine, unfortunately, it stopped working after 7 months. A friend of ours had it and we liked it when saw it in her toddler’s room so we decided to get it. We kept it up high away from the kids because we knew they’d probably love tapping it and we didn’t want to risk it breaking. Unfortunately, it stopped working on its own. Pretty disappointed. We will be going back to using the sound machine we’ve had for 4 years now
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Really expensive, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: There's no denying that this thing is an overpriced nightlight/sound machine. For the cost, I'm deducting a star. That being said, it has been working great for us and is really the best tool of its kind. I find the features and the manner of controlling it extremely user-friendly. The only imperfect thing is that the touch-sensitive metal rim doesn't always seem to respond, but it's easy to overcome that problem with a bit of fiddling or using the app. My 3 year old took to it immediately. I'm not sure if it would work as well with a younger child, but it's getting me some extra sleep right now, which is pretty amazing. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Clever idea...but overpriced...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's somewhat overpriced for what you get. I do like that you can set programs but I think you should be able to modify the program while it's already running. Instead, if its 7:35 and you want to make changes to a program that started at 7:30, you have to change the start time to 7:36, or it won't take effect until the next day. No biggie for a $30 nightlight... but for $60?!!, it's an irritating programming issue that should have been fixed, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V.

customer_reviews.title: Best White Noise Machine
customer_reviews.text: Best night light and sound machine combo. So many great features. It can even be used for adults. My kids love this. It helps to be able to brighten and lower the light at night from my phone when I get up to nurse my baby. My bigger kid loves the alternating light feature. The timer can be set to wake up to the sound of birds chirping in the morning. The white noise washer machine sound is great for helping my infant sleep and blocking other loud sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Diego & Kathryn Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This has been a GAME CHANGER with my toddler’s sleep training! I was at a complete loss when I potty trained her and took the lock off her door. She was never sleeping! This was recommended to me and I’m so glad I made the investment. She feels so empowered when it comes to her bedtime now. A few things I would change: the lowest brightness is still to bright at night. Obviously just fine during the day. I wish there was a way the sleep timer could be more flexible. Sometimes she starts her nap a half hour later, etc. Or I wish I could more easily lock the settings when it isn’t a preset time.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Just "No"
customer_reviews.text: Have a two year sleep regression issue? DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! I have never written a negative review, bit man did the Hatch make a bad situation worse for us. We are on night 3 (if you can call it "night", since it's 3am, and I've just spent an hour consoling my 2 year old after unplugging the device.) My guy went from waking up at 5:30 to 1am for the past 3 nights. Screaming because the red light (which I thought we had programmed to stay off, came on EXTREMELY bright) Thanks!!! Sarcasm intended. We'll be returning this as soon as humanly possible.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sound machine—seriously!! We bought this at the beginning of Covid Stay at Home because our three year old was getting up very early. We set the sound machine to turn green when she could get out of bed in the morning—worked great! I loved it so much I purchased one for my newborn. It works perfectly for nighttime feedings and changing—I don’t have to turn on any bright lamps, etc. and it has an easy touch ring for on and off! Highly recommend even though it cost more than most sound machine/nightlight combos.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Borne

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a used product.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the light, it was clear that this was a used product. The packaging was ripped, the plastic was halfhazardly wrapped around the wires, and the box looked used. After trying it, it’s clear why someone returned it, and surprising that the company would send it out to another customer. When trying to increase the volume, it will turn on the light instead, or will switch to a lullaby when originally on the white noise setting. The light also seems to sporadically work, and I need to press buttons repeatidly to get them to work. This, as one would imagine, is not helpful when trying to get a fussy baby to settle down.
customer_reviews.author: Gatsby Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not too loud
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this sooner. I almost didn't get this because of some reviews saying it was too loud. They must have fixed the problem because I can put the sound very low. But it's white noise to help the baby sleep. If too low, the sound won't block out our household sounds that could wake her up. You can put the sound on 0-100%. I usually have the sound on 10-15%. You can also choose to have no light because that too can be 0-100%
customer_reviews.author: Mindy H

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite
customer_reviews.text: We use in nursery. Light doesn't get bright enough but is manageable. We have a few sound machines, this is our least favorite. Though the remote is nice for not getting out of bed it takes a while to load & doesn't always work right. The buttons on the bottom I find inconvienent, especially b/c if you want to use them in the dark you can't see them, even with the light on. We wanted to return this but we're too tired with our newborn that we never got around to it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great little noise machine helping babes sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is overall great! I have used it daily since bringing our daughter home and I believe it contributes to her sleeping soundly. She very seldom wakes startled and is a great sleeper. The sound quality is decent and the brightness of the light is appropriate (not too bright or dim). A challenge is adjusting the volume as that control is beneath the unit and reaching for it sometimes loosens the electric connection. The minor downfall of the volume has not dissuaded us from gifting this twice to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the Bluetooth, ugh
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the features on this light. You can adjust brightness, change times from the app (if you child sleeps until 730 one morning and the time is set for 7). I love the sounds you can use. 4 stars because it uses Bluetooth only... which is distance sensitive. I almost have to be right outside if the room to make changes from my phone. I will take the inconvenience because the light is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Would be awesome if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fantastic product ... but ours didn’t work. Once we conneced the app, it made booming clicking noises unless muted. None of the sound options would play. Went through several rounds with very responsive customer service before giving up. Disappointed with this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the Hatch! I was very hesitant in spending the money to buy this as we use to use an iPad at night and nap time for our now one year old. We found that the iPad turns off after sometime and our son would wake up when the battery died or turn off and it would be quite and dark in his room. The Hatch is such a great change, we can control it from our phones and we don’t have to worry about it turning off or battery dying. So happy we found the Hatch.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, great sound, works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my 2 yo son who likes to wake my butt up at the break of dawn every morning including weekends. Is replacing a similar night light that also changes rainbow colors but ate two AA batteries every week. Although this night light was a splurge its ability to change the brightness of the light, loudness of the sounds, sound types, colors of the light and set changes to cue wake up time all from your phone I thought it was worth it. Haven't been disappointed yet but have yet to fully utilize the "ready to wake" feature.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie&Ben

customer_reviews.title: Okay product but warning seller less than okay
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be plugged in at all times, not a light you can bring with you to change diaper, feed etc I returned this and seller was not not cooperative and charged for return, warning only purchase if you are certain you will not return as you get charged and seller is not understanding
customer_reviews.author: HeatherJ05

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: We like this and the ability to customize it for our toddler. Two annoying points. First, it can only be controlled by one phone so if the person whose phone it’s on is not home, it cannot be adjusted (not even remotely). Maybe set it up on a spare iPad. Secondly, if you adjust the program while it’s already on, it doesn’t take effect for current cycle. IE if I want to move it later when our son is sleeping soundly, it just turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! My baby hates to sleep without white noise on and I went months without a white noise machine. Was just using my phone or a tablet and it was so inconvenient. I saw people in the reviews complaining about it wanting your location and I was a little concerned about that but you don't always have to use the app. I just use the presets and hardly ever have it connected to my phone anymore. It gets very loud and the nightlight is pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only on day 2 with this thing and it AMAZING if you're trying to teach a toddler when it's time to stay in bed and when it's time to get up. I love all the features from the lights to the timer function and the sound options. If you're struggling with a toddler getting up too early (like waking up at 2 am thinking it's time to get up and waking younger siblings in the process!) I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Choice of colors/sounds/volume
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Hatch to help our daughter work on her transition to the big kid bed. She was having a difficult time understanding "ok, you need to stay in your bed/room until X time," so this enabled us to set a light/sound indication for when it was appropriate for her to get up in the morning. It definitely takes a few days and no kid is ever perfect, but for the most part it has truly helped us so much. She stays in her bed until she sees the light turn green and the bird chirping sound comes on. She gets so excited when this happens and she knows it's time to start the day. Thank you, Hatch company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company to do business with
customer_reviews.text: Updated review - After having issues and completing a review, I was contacted directly by Hatch. After I explained my issues with the machine I’d purchased, the company very quickly sent a replacement machine, which we have been using for about a month without any issues. I don’t ever expect every single product to be perfect coming out of production, but I *always* appreciate a company that goes out of their way to make a customer feel like each and every consumer matters, and Hatch did just that. Thank you for your stellar customer service Hatch!! ————- This machine worked great for about two weeks and out of the blue, the sound became intermittent making the device unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Nophney

customer_reviews.title: Useful at different stages
customer_reviews.text: We liked this item so much that when we moved our daughter to her room, we bought ourselves one of these... Mostly because we can't sleep without the waves sound now. The app could be improved; sometimes is doesn't sync and can't be controlled by the app. However, it doesn't impact the machine itself as you can still change it all from the base. We chose this one because it also serves as a "time to wake" clock for toddlers and you can establish routine times with it. We haven't gotten that far but it seems like this product is something that can be used at many stages so it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Overthesea

customer_reviews.title: Super load
customer_reviews.text: Some have complained about how loud it is but I love it. We have two dogs that bark at every little thing and with the dohm sound machine she would wake bc it didn’t drown the dogs out. With the hatch she doesn’t even flinch. Wish I had this from the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing has taught my toddler when it’s okay to leave her room in the morning!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! I have free programs set for my toddler. One that turns on at bedtime, with her favorite color and white noise sound. Then at about 12pm the light gets dimmer and the sound also goes down a bit. At wake up time, the light is set to yellow orange and I have it play bird singing. She knows not to leave her room until the birds sing. As a parent, I have been able to sleep a little longer thanks to her waiting for the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Soto's Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory...
customer_reviews.text: My kids don’t particularly like to sleep. And if they are sleeping they prefer to be tangled around a parent. So I tried this nightlight with trepidation. It’s been a week or two and my daughter has still continued to sneak into our bed every night other than the eve of Easter when the fear of not getting an Easter basket was strong enough to keep her in bed. She was in our room within 30 seconds of my turning her light to green with quietly chirping birds. I do LOVE that I can change it via the app on my phone. That is fantastic. Alas, sleep problems persist.
customer_reviews.author: skr2010

customer_reviews.title: Product failed...customer service won't replace
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased two hatch baby rests. I loved the sleek design and ability to change the colors via phone if I need an "early bedtime". The app is a bit clunky and it is time-consuming to set up. In my dream world we would be able to play our own music through the system, but I digress. A couple months after purchase the sound failed on one machine. a while later the second machine failed won't turn on...completely dead. Customer service was happy to replace ONE of our machines. in an extremely unprofessional back and forth they are basically saying sorry about your luck. We had a bad batch here is a 25% off coupon. NOPE NOPE NOPE
customer_reviews.author: cappo

customer_reviews.title: Great controlled light & sound machine
customer_reviews.text: Both our kids really enjoy the Hatch light & sounds during their nap times and bedtimes. It’s definitely not something that I would have expected to be a decent investment, but wound up getting a 2nd one without a thought after using it with our first. It’s still a reasonable size for traveling, although on the larger size It’s nice that it is Bluetooth rather than internet controlled, which makes it more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-Even Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when my original Hatch stopped working after 2.5 years because I loved it so much. I messaged Hatch via Facebook and asked them if there was any way they could help me. They attempted to troubleshoot and when that failed, they replaced my Hatch FOR FREE even though it was past the warranty time frame and even though it was considered normal wear and tear. I am so appreciative of them for that. A great product with truly great customer service is a rare thing to find and Hatch has both!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for customization and overnight use.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great sound machine! Here are some of my thoughts: Pros - stays on all night, great custom settings for brightness and volume combos, nice to control from another room, fades in sound when turned on Cons - sound cuts out immediately when shut off (instead of fading out), no heartbeat or womb sounds, the app takes a few seconds to load
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: We have the technology!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful device has been a bed time lifesaver when our little one started being scared of the dark. Instead of having a sound machine and a nightlight, this is both with the added benefit of automatically turning on to indicate that its bedtime. Additionally, the wake up option is amazing! Our daughter no longer gets up and wanders about the house without us, you can bet she flies out of bed when she sees it turn green though!
customer_reviews.author: mrsreedy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 4-year old from waking me up at 5am
customer_reviews.text: I love the how easy it is to program this thing. My son knows that "once the birds start chirping" it's okay to come out of his room in the morning. I had used one of the "okay to wake" clocks before, but I just find this one to be much easier to use. I'm planning to get a second one for my younger son. Only downside I've noticed is that you have to be fairly close to it to control it - I can't adjust it from my room across the house.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Helps my baby sleep well! Great choice for a sound machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! The sounds are nice, and I love the colors of lights. I also like that you can program some preferred settings. Be cautious though, it will get very loud, over the decibel level that can cause hearing damage, so don’t operate at full volume!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think it’s a great product. I wish it would have a few more white noise sounds instead of nature and lullabies, but that’s mostly because those are the sounds my baby prefers. My biggest complaint is the app. Often times I will click on the app and it says it can’t find my device. Then I have to get out of it and go back in a few times. It’s annoying. Otherwise all the device buttons are underneath and it’s not convenient trying to press those while holding a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 1/2 year-old son. In all of his 6.5 years, he has only slept through the night a handful of times. Every night he ends up in my bed. Since purchasing this device, he has stayed in his bed all night every night. The app is super easy to use & I like that I can set different programs for him depending on our daily schedule. I also like that it can be used as a noise machine since my son always sleeps with one. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: humboldt29

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine - Don't Be a Cheapskate
customer_reviews.text: We were cheapskates and bought a $15 sound machine a couple years ago. It worked well for a year, and then for 6 months it sometimes worked, sometimes didn't, and then it finally stopped working at all. I cursed myself for being a cheapskate and then decided to get the Hatch Baby Rest. While we've only had it for 9 months it has worked amazingly and I can tell it's a quality build. My wife was hesitant about the price but I convinced her that it would be worth getting this instead of getting another crappy one that we'll have to replace every 18 months. This machine has a ton of great color and song options, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this product overall. We bought in 2017 for a noise maker for our newborn. We kept the item in the original box. Packed away in his room nicely and recently started to use it again. It not longer works. The sound turns off and on every 5 minutes, we needed to replace the plug and the light is no longer bright. We’ve adjusted settings on the app to try and fix the issue, no success. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Key

customer_reviews.title: Helped our nights!
customer_reviews.text: This was a night saver! My daughter eventually won't cry to leave her room. She could pick the music and much better the color, having a purple night light was great for her. Controlling it from our phones is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders for transition from crib to bed!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonderfully for our 3 year old. The light settings and the sound settings are great. While part of me likes that it ONLY uses Bluetooth (yay for not being dependent on WIFI) it also makes it tricky if I'm not around. I wish there was an easier way for other people to change the settings. Otherwise, it's plenty loud enough to substitute as a sound machine, the light dims enough to disrupt sleep, and I LOVE having a clear signal when it's time for bed, and when it's okay to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bookjunkie

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good investment! My 2 year old is now right on track and generally waits patiently after sleeping (sometimes in bed sometimes by the door) for his light to change colors. He know I will come get him shortly after the change. The sound machine function works wonders. With a house full of boys, four plus my husband, it helps them sleep. I just wish there was a battery function available as our power tends to go out and we have conditioned the toddler to wake up when the sound changes. We do have a back up battery operated one it would just be nice to only need the one with a back up battery function.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.E. TX

customer_reviews.title: Love the customization
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sound machine! It goes everywhere with us! It has so many color and sound options to pick from. I usually find white noise machines annoying but surprisingly this one has many soothing sounds. I like the ability to control everything from my phone. I can adjust the volume, brightness, sound, on/off, or set a shutoff time without being in the room and disturbing baby. Great product that grows with baby.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina B.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for my two children 4 years old and 2 years old. They were waking up every night and before 6 AM every morning. Once we got this and taught them what the colors meant they’ve been sleeping through the night and sleeping until 7am consistently. It was super easy to set up and use on the phone. The only negative is that the white noise level is really loud and I have to set it extremely low so as to not wake the kids or be disruptive. My kids love to play with the colors and sounds before bed and it helps calm them down. Truly a lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I wanted white noise and a night light in one. It is very customizable. For example we have the soothing yellow light automatically turn on at bed and nap time with “sleep music” (waves crashing). In the morning at 7, the light turns to rainbow and that is my two year old que that it is now ok to get out of bed if he is awake. At 3:30, after nap, the light again changes to rainbow, but music changes to wake him up so he won’t sleep to late if I am not paying attention to the time. Everything is very easy to customize in the app.i love it.
customer_reviews.author: nunesie26

customer_reviews.title: The best sound machine
customer_reviews.text: Our Marpac started making a grinding noise after about 18months of use. I contemplated reordering the same unit, but really like the idea of having a nightlight. The Hatch Rest is really convenient. I can turn the nightlight on using the app on my phone, before going into my twins’ room. I can control the color and brightness remotely. The sound gets much louder than the Marpac, which is great for us. I need loud white noise with the twins. I’m really happy with this purchase - it’s the best sound machine we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET CROWLEY

customer_reviews.title: BEST toddler/kid product
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly awesome. We were having an issue with our toddler daughter getting out of bed in the middle of the night so we bought this instead of the Ok To Wake Clock. She chose the color pink as her ‘night light’ and she knows she cannot her out of bed until the pink light goes off at whatever time I set it for. Love that I can control everything through an app via my phone! The sounds, colors & brightness are awesome. High quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it were only less expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've had it only a few days but so far I really like it. I think my newborn likes it too. He sleeps longer, seems to soothe him. My other children want one now! The colors are really nice. Music is loud enough, clear. I would give it 5 stars but it seems to be made of inexpensive material. For the price, I thought it would be a lot nicer in look and touch. I'm hopeful it lasts. My cell can do the same with an app. Will have to consider it long before purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyRed

customer_reviews.title: Great Time-To-Wake
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of early wakings, we had tried everything! We heard about "time to wake" clocks but I didn't find any that I loved. I finally came across the Hatch and it is the best thing ever! My 2 year old son love it! We have it set to the timer and let him choose his color preference. Now in the morning we hear "Green. Wake up! Green!"
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool for toddler wake up schedule
customer_reviews.text: My son struggled with waking up too early. This device really helped. Now if he wakes up on his own and his wake up music isn't on yet, he just patiently lays in bed until the music comes on. Many times he actually roles over and goes back to sleep. This has really allowed me more time in the morning to get my tasks done while my kiddo is still supposed to be in bed! Will absolutely use this on all kiddos in the future and recommend to other moms!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Good for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a week, but so far so good! I told my son, "Red means stay in bed" and "Green means go (out to find me)". It has worked so far, and I hope it continues to work. He had been waking up before 6, so I set it to 6:30am. He comes out as soon as it turns green. I might try a later time soon. He is almost 3 and I don't think it would have worked for him sooner. He also likes wheni put it on the color changing mode for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Orth

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the option to set a program that allows my child to see when he is allowed to get up so rather than yelling for me at the wee hours of the morning to see if he is able to get up yet he will go back to sleep and wait until he sees the light turn green. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I wanted to also be able to replace the little lamp we have for reading with this however it is nowhere near bright enough to read even on the brightest setting. Great little device though!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We were struggling getting our 3 year old to GO to sleep and wanted something that would turn on automatically and change colors and sounds as bed time progressed (getting ready, prayers, bedtime). This has surpassed my expectations and has been absolutely fantastic. There are tons of colors and sounds to choose from and I have all kinds of things programmed. It has absolutely helped get our kiddo on track and I couldn’t recommend it more!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: The cord comes out every time you touch it and shut the machine off
customer_reviews.text: Such a good idea, but they messed up on some things. The cord comes undone and disconnects from the unit every time u touch it. It doesn’t turn on or off easily sometimes. I always find myself having to reach for the controls on the bottom which again makes the cord fall out and it shut off. It’s just such a pain in the ass. And it never stays on the last setting u had it on. I just want to love this thing and I hate it, I want to throw it across the room half the time. If you have a baby in your hand and you’re trying to mess with it it’s so obnoxious
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Drowns out a SWAT sound cannon!
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine has been amazing. We've used it since day 1. Then, a neighbor was resisting arrest and SWAT used a sound cannon to irritate him. Our son did not move a muscle! He stayed sound asleep thanks to the soothing noise of the Hatch. Love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4mo BUT great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was a good little sound machine. I wasn’t a fan of the cord connection- it would come unplugged rather easily and was sometimes difficult to plug back in, especially in the dark. Doesn’t matter anymore- it broke after 4 months.. One month after the return window closed, of course. Not worth the $$. UPDATE: I spoke with customer service at Hatch. After trouble shooting with me, they replaced my unit and I returned my defective unit directly to the company to review. The new unit has a different power adaptor which seems much more durable. Great to see a company that stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Soft colors and lots of sounds!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great noise machine. Lots of sounds to choose from (love the laundry machine option), and nice soft colors that are great to use for nighttime nursing. The Bluetooth connection for the phone is a nice idea, but you pretty much have to be next to the room in question to connect to it. If your house is fairly big, or even fairly medium size, you won't be able to connect from most places. Even with that issue I purchased a second one for my baby after using one with my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Such a life saver! Wish we would have been told about this when making our registry. Continuous noise and its loud enough and plug in so it never dies! All the other noise makers we bought had 20- 60min tops or werent loud enough, died after a few days. Easy to adjust the brightness and sound. From phone ap or on the device itself. Definitely recommend. Its pricey but you save in the long run after we bought or were gifted 3 different noise machines. There are multiple settings for sound: waves, wind, stream, rain, forest and then colors of light: green, red, yellow, orange, blue, teal any color you want really.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hatch Baby Rest Sound Machine, Night Light and Time-to-Rise
product_meta.description:
Both night light and sound machine, Rest is designed using scientifically proven light colors that promote healthy circadian rhythms and melatonin production with white noise to aid sleep. Rest is fully customizable, programmable, and controlled from your smartphone. As your child moves from bassinet to big kid bed, Rest grows with your needs - first providing soft light for middle of the night diaper changes and nursing sessions, then alerting your toddler when it is ok to get out of bed in the morning. Reinventing bedtime to get your family a better night’s rest.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Create the ideal sleep environment for your child Encourage a better night’s sleep for your baby, toddler or big kid by customizing hues, brightness and sounds, and save them as favorites for future use. Simplify baby’s nighttime feedings and diaper changes with gentle lighting and white noise. Comfort and reassure growing toddlers with a nightlight that can safely stay on all night. Set and control programs from the device or remotely from your phone - no need to disrupt a sleeping baby. 

 • Color
• Brightness
• Sound 
• Volume

Establish healthy sleep routines Create programs to help get your family on a healthy sleep schedule. Favorites include:

 • Set a time-to-rise to let your toddler know when it's time to get out of bed (so mom and dad get a little more rest) 
• Set a bedtime program with fun colors and music to turn on in the evenings, alerting your toddler that bedtime is near




FOR THE MODERN NURSERY Modern design with night light and sound machine in one smart device. Coordinate styles with your child’s room using coverlets in fun patterns and colors (sold separately).

REMOTELY FROM YOUR PHONE No need to disrupt a sleeping baby. Turn Rest on and off and change the volume and brightness remotely from your smartphone. Or, set programs to run each day to help your child get on a healthy sleep schedule.

WITH CUSTOM COLORS AND SOUNDS Create the ideal sleep environment for your child’s unique sleep needs by choosing from a range of custom colors and sound choices. Night light feature helps children feel secure. Option to stay on all night and stays cool to the touch.




Night Light, Sound Machine, and Time-to-Rise Our mission at Hatch Baby is to make raising babies and kids a little bit easier with smart technology. We believe that modern design and thoughtful function can come together to create solutions for the toughest job out there: parenting. Our suite of products, Rest, Grow, and Listen, help give parents the peace of mind they need that their babies are growing into happy, healthy kids.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Modern. Simple. Personalized.

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

At Hatch Baby, we’re parents of kids of all ages, and we know how hard it can be to help our children fall asleep and stay asleep. After trying just about everything to help get our kids to sleep, we built Hatch Baby Rest, rolling all the functions we know help little ones sleep best into one modern, functional and beautifully designed device. More than just a night light, sound machine, or OK-to-wake alarm, Rest is the smart, fully customizable and remotely controlled solution designed for babies and kids that grows with their changing sleep needs.

What makes your product special?

Rest is the all-in-one sleep solution that parents have been wishing existed for years. We know from personal experience how frustrating it is to have a sound machine that can only be controlled from the device itself, or a nightlight that shuts off after a set period of time, only to require sneaking into a sleeping toddler’s room to turn it back on. There had to be a better way than needing multiple gadgets to help create just the right atmosphere to encourage babies and kids to sleep through the night. We knew there was a better way, and that’s why we created Rest. By combining all the functions of a night light, sound machine, and ok-to-wake alert into one beautiful and simple design, and better yet, making it totally controllable from a smartphone, we knew we had the product that so many parents have been asking for.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Hearing from parents who use and love our product has been, hands down, the most inspiring and exciting part of this start-up experience. We knew that we had a great product when our beta testers asked if they could keep their Rests because they had become an integral part of their child’s sleep routine. It’s so rewarding to be building the products that make life a little easier for parents.
